project.name: Autonomous World Engine
project.description: An autonomous world engine to power 3D experience
project.longDescription: AWE (Autonomous World Engine) is a platform for creating and experiencing onchain mini-games running on MegaETH testnet. The platform features interactive 3D experiences with real-time multiplayer capabilities and on-chain game mechanics.

features.title: Onchain Mini-Games
features.description: Play and interact with games that run directly on the blockchain.

features.title: Real-time Multiplayer
features.description: Interact with other players in real-time through chat and gameplay.

features.title: 3D Experience
features.description: Immersive 3D environment for enhanced gaming experience.

features.title: Blockchain Integration
features.description: Seamless integration with MegaETH for on-chain game mechanics.

project.currentStatus: AWE is currently available on MegaETH testnet with the Whack A Fluffle game and more experiences coming soon.

steps.title: Game Overview
steps.content:
Whack A Fluffle is a multiplayer game where:

• Fluffles spawn randomly on a contract
• Whack the fluffle before it times out or another live player gets it
• Earn a point for each fluffle you whack
• Talk to other live players in the chatbox
